text: Paul Hürlimann (21 November 1933 - 1 March 2012) was a Swiss equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Swiss male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Switzerland Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:People from Wädenswil
title: Paul Hürlimann
